details:
verb
- eliminate by paying off (debts)
= synonyms: pay off
- get rid of someone who may be a threat by killing
= example: get rid of someone who may be a threat by killing
= synonyms: waste
- settle the affairs of by determining the debts and applying the assets to pay them off
= example: settle the affairs of by determining the debts and applying the assets to pay them off
- convert into cash
= example: convert into cash
= synonyms: realise, realize
